abstract: President Obama's campaign is trying to harness the power of Twitter to put pressure on Republican lawmakers to pass his jobs bill.
snippet: President Obama's campaign is trying to harness the power of Twitter to put pressure on Republican lawmakers to pass his jobs bill.
lead_paragraph: President Obama's campaign is trying to harness the power of Twitter to put pressure on Republican lawmakers to pass his jobs bill, according to a campaign official.

headline.main: Obama Campaign Takes Jobs Fight to Twitter
